Pre-Game Insights: The Tampa Bay Rays and the Cleveland Guardians meet Saturday in MLB action from Progressive Field.
This will be the third installment in a four-game series.
The Rays played the Philadelphia Phillies in their last set and didn’t do very well, being swept 2-1, 9-4 and 3-2.
After a 5-2 opener win, on Friday versus Cleveland the Rays jumped out to a three-run lead early and held on for the win 3-1.
In the Saturday starter slot the Rays are going with Drew Rasmussen, who is 0-1 with a 2.79 ERA over 11 games (three starts) this year.
Rasmussen is 20-11 with a 2.96 career ERA.
The Cleveland Guardians played the Chicago White Sox this week and won all three games 5-3, 5-0 and 6-4 for a sweep.
On Friday the Guardians were out-hit 8-4 in the defeat.
Joey Cantillo will start for Cleveland on Saturday. Over the first six games (five starts) of his career Cantillo is 1-3 with a 5.96 ERA. He has 25 Ks in 25.2 frames total.
Eight of the last nine games between the Rays and Guardians at Progressive Field have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Twelve of the Rays' last 14 night games against American League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Lane Thomas has recorded a Double in three of the Guardians' last four night games against opponents that held a losing record.
Steven Kwan has recorded at least one Single in each of his last four appearances against opponents that held a losing record.
Jose Ramirez has recorded at least one hit in each of the Guardians' last seven games at Progressive Field against AL East opponents that held a losing record.
Jose Ramirez has scored at least one run in nine of the Guardians' last 10 games against AL East opponents at Progressive Field.
Lane Thomas has recorded at least one RBI in four of the Guardians' last five games against AL opponents.
Jose Ramirez has recorded at least one total base in each of the Guardians' last seven games at Progressive Field against AL East opponents that held a losing record.
Steven Kwan has hit a home run in two of his last three home appearances against AL East opponents that held a losing record.
Yandy Diaz has recorded at least one Single in seven of his last eight appearances.
Drew Rasmussen has recorded three or more strikeouts in 17 of his last 20 appearances in night games.
Brandon Lowe has recorded at least one hit in each of the Rays' last six games against the Guardians.
Jose Siri has scored a run in each of the Rays' last four road games against the Guardians.
Brandon Lowe has recorded at least one total base in each of the Rays' last six games against the Guardians.
Brandon Lowe has hit a home run in two of the Rays' last three road games against AL Central opponents.
